CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 4, 1953, pg. 16 reads: "Co-Workers Fete Retiring Postal Worker - Friends and co-workers gathered at the home of Mr. and Mrs. Young, 306 Chalfont Street, Saturday at a birthday testimonial for Ernest L. Taylor, retiring postal worker, who was 70 last Tuesday. His co-workers are pictured with him.  Front row, left to right: William McCarthy, Kenneth Ott, Ernest L. Taylor, Henry Henderson and Ralph Gardner.  Back row: David Wilson, William Thomas, Clifford Thompson, Joseph Byrne and Bert Thompson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, front row, from left: William McCarthy, Kenneth Ott, Ernest L. Taylor, guest of honor; Henry Henderson, and Ralph Gardner; back row: David Wilson, William Thomas, Clifford Thompson, Joseph Byrne, and Bert Thompson, posed in basement for birthday testimonial in home of Mr. and Mrs. Young, 306 Chalfont Street
